item.title: Spicy Chicken Stir-Fry
item.description: Ingredients 2 tsp. plus ¼ cup soy sauce 2½ tsp. cornstarch, divided 1½ tsp. sugar, divided ½ tsp. kosher salt, plus more 1 lb. skinless, boneless chicken thighs 2 Tbsp. unseasoned rice vinegar 4 garlic cloves 1 2" piece ginger 6 scallions ⅓ cup vegetable oil ¾ cup roasted, salted peanuts Rice (for serving; optional) Recipe Whisk together 2 tsp. soy sauce, 1½ tsp. cornstarch, ½ tsp. sugar, and ½ tsp.
